column4: hello, i need help with remote desktop. how do i connect to a machine that is not on my local network ?
you would need to know the remote pc curtrent IP address
do you know what the IP address is of the remote machine
yes but when i enter it i get 'connection closed'
see if you can get VNC Server installed on the remote machine (tightvnc) and then get a vnc client on ur machine and use the ip address
if you search on google - port forarding (router model number) .. that should get u a walkthrough
ok, i hope the person can find out her router model number...
if you only need it for today you could try logmein remote on a trial basis
i would need it for more than today...
bare with me a second i know its like a 15day trial just getting you the address for it

www.logmeinrescue.com you set an account up get a job reference pin and give that to your friend. he then goes to www.123rescue.com and types the pin then you can take control so long as he accepts everything (URL's could be wrong)
ok I'll definitely try it out thanks
worst case if your account trial expires just register a different email address.
If your going to be giving constant remote assistance to this machine i would also recommend www.logmein.com as you can have a free account with them
